tr.title: Petrol Dogalgaz Jeotermal
tr.description: Petrol, dogalgaz ve jeotermal enerji sektorlerinde kullanilan ekipmanlar icin ozel yuzey kaplama cozumleri sunuyoruz.
tr.intro: Enerji sektoru ekipmanlari son derece zorlu kosullarda calisir. Yuksek basinc, asindirici ortamlar ve surekli temas, parcalarin hizla asinmasina neden olur.

technicalSpecs.title: Sondaj Bitleri
technicalSpecs.description: Tungsten karbur ve diamond coating ile asiri asinma direnci

technicalSpecs.title: Pompa Parcalari
technicalSpecs.description: Kavitasyon ve erozyon direnci yuksek HVOF kaplamalar

technicalSpecs.title: Valf Sistemleri
technicalSpecs.description: Korozyon direnci icin ozel alasim kaplamalar

en.title: Oil Natural Gas Geothermal
en.description: We offer special surface coating solutions for equipment used in oil, natural gas and geothermal energy sectors.
en.intro: Energy sector equipment operates under extremely harsh conditions. High pressure, abrasive environments and continuous contact cause parts to wear out quickly.

technicalSpecs.title: Drill Bits
technicalSpecs.description: Extreme wear resistance with tungsten carbide and diamond coating

technicalSpecs.title: Pump Parts
technicalSpecs.description: HVOF coatings with high cavitation and erosion resistance

technicalSpecs.title: Valve Systems
technicalSpecs.description: Special alloy coatings for corrosion resistance

tr.title: Madencilik
tr.description: Madencilik ekipmanlarinin zorlu calisma kosullarina dayanmasi icin tungsten karbur ve hardfacing kaplamalar uyguluyoruz.
tr.intro: Madencilik ekipmanlari tas mineral ve toprakla surekli temas halindedir. Bu da hizli asinmaya ve uretim kayiplarina yol acar.

technicalSpecs.title: Kirici Ceneler
technicalSpecs.description: Hardfacing ile darbe ve asinma direnci

technicalSpecs.title: Konveyor Rulolar
technicalSpecs.description: Chrome karbur kaplama ile uzun omur

technicalSpecs.title: Kazici Uclar
technicalSpecs.description: Tungsten karbur ile maksimum dayaniklilik

en.title: Mining
en.description: We apply tungsten carbide and hardfacing coatings for mining equipment to withstand harsh working conditions.
en.intro: Mining equipment is in constant contact with rock minerals and soil. This leads to rapid wear and production losses.

technicalSpecs.title: Crusher Jaws
technicalSpecs.description: Impact and wear resistance with hardfacing

technicalSpecs.title: Conveyor Rollers
technicalSpecs.description: Long life with chrome carbide coating

technicalSpecs.title: Excavator Tips
technicalSpecs.description: Maximum durability with tungsten carbide

tr.title: Hidroelektrik Santralleri
tr.description: Turbin kanatlari, pompa impellerleri ve valf govdeleri icin kavitasyon ve erozyon direnci yuksek kaplamalar sunuyoruz.
tr.intro: Hidroelektrik santrallerinde su akisi ile surekli temas eden parcalar kavitasyon ve erozyon nedeniyle hizla asinir.

technicalSpecs.title: Turbin Kanatlari
technicalSpecs.description: Kavitasyon direnci yuksek ozel kaplamalar

technicalSpecs.title: Pompa Impellerleri
technicalSpecs.description: Erozyon direnci icin HVOF kaplama

en.title: Hydroelectric Power Plants
en.description: We offer coatings with high cavitation and erosion resistance for turbine blades, pump impellers and valve bodies.
en.intro: Parts in constant contact with water flow in hydroelectric power plants wear out quickly due to cavitation and erosion.

technicalSpecs.title: Turbine Blades
technicalSpecs.description: Special coatings with high cavitation resistance

technicalSpecs.title: Pump Impellers
technicalSpecs.description: HVOF coating for erosion resistance

tr.title: Geri Donusum
tr.description: Geri donusum tesislerinde kullanilan kirici, ogutucü ve tasima ekipmanlari icin asinma ve darbe direnci saglayan kaplama sistemleri uyguluyoruz.
tr.intro: Geri donusum tesislerinde ekipmanlar metal, plastik ve cam gibi sert malzemelerle temas eder.

technicalSpecs.title: Kirici Sistemler
technicalSpecs.description: Yuksek darbe direnci

en.title: Recycling
en.description: We apply coating systems that provide wear and impact resistance for crushing, grinding and conveying equipment used in recycling facilities.
en.intro: Equipment in recycling facilities comes into contact with hard materials such as metal, plastic and glass.

technicalSpecs.title: Crusher Systems
technicalSpecs.description: High impact resistance

technicalSpecs.title: Grinder Blades
technicalSpecs.description: Maximum wear resistance
